game.name: Amer Fighting - عامر المشاجرة
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Get ready to rumble in Amer Fighting, the ultimate party fighting game where the fun never stops! Gather your friends and dive into an exciting family fight for up to 6 players as each battle is a chance to become a legend! In Amer Fighting, everyone can fight, but only one can win!
